lang.key: Maintained by Madison Kelly (mkelly@alteeve.ca) for Striker.

-=] Striker Monitor
Configuration file: [#!var!config_file!#] not found. Beginning configuration.

### Striker - Scanner # Configuration file.
# Pg == PostgreSQL # (no other SQL server supported yet) db::type = #!var!db::type!#
# Hostname or IP address of SQL server host. db::server = #!var!db::server!#
# TCP port used to connect to SQL server. db::port = #!var!db::port!#
# Database name used by Striker. db::name = #!var!db::name!#
# Database user name. db::username = #!var!db::user!#
# Database user's password. db::password = #!var!db::password!#
Host name or IP of database server? (#!var!answer!#):
TCP port used to connect to the database? (#!var!answer!#):
User to connect to the database as? (#!var!answer!#):
